title: Play Safe

abstract: Made by The Australian National Film Board for the Road Safety Council  in 1948, this short documentary on road safety features world famous cricketer Don Bradman.
description: Aimed at children, this film highlights a number of road safety aspects. Don Bradman talks to the children about avoiding accidents, both going and coming from school, and during playtime on the school playground.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: VoD Program; B2002913; 100 Years of Film Australia; Active; 2013
